Changes
=======

2.1 (2013-08-23)
----------------

- run egg_info before develop to make sure SOURCES.txt exists and is up
  to date

2.0 (2013-08-15)
----------------

- Conform to Zope repository policy.
- Support Python 3
- Fix issue where recently deleted files could cause an exception if
  they were still in SOURCES.txt

1.0.0 (2009-03-10)
------------------

- Initial Release
